entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 40 km/h gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow early in the evening. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 March 2023
